name: Asteroids 2021
description:
Game

Asteroids 2021 is a modern reimagining of the classic arcade game Asteroids released by Atari in 1979. Enjoy the timeless fun in trying to beat you and your friends' high scores in this colorful twin-stick space shooter!

Control your spaceship with mouse and keyboard, or a gamepad (tested for Xbox controller). See details in-game. Downloadable version has a bit better sound mixing.

Let the world try to beat your high score - post it in the comments!

Project

This is the first Unity game I've created as a solo developer and beginner programmer. It was made in a couple of weeks during the course The Indie Quest led by the awesome guy Retro. The assignment was "remake a one-screen 70's arcade game in Unity".

Thank you for playing!!
